long_description: Switch on the Goal Zero Luna LED light to illuminate anything from a keyboard to a tent. Its low power draw makes it a long-lasting light solution. 1 watt LED with 10 bulbs efficiently produces bright, white light and is rated for 20,000 hrs. of use. Snakelike 9 in. bendable cord lets you secure the light around objects and set it at the perfect angle. The Goal Zero Luna LED light can be powered from a Goal Zero power pack (sold separately) or any USB port.
short_description: Switch on the Goal Zero Luna LED light to illuminate anything from a keyboard to a tent. Its low power draw makes it a long-lasting light solution.
